title: HamsterEcoHelper 报错
author: 章鱼酱
txt_content:
第一次进服务器没有报错,重进服务器就报错了...

[12:31:31] [Server thread/ERROR]: Could not pass event PlayerJoinEvent to HamsterEcoHelper v6.2.220-mc1.13.2
